owner_id.description: The unique identifier of the owner associated with the metafield data

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the metafield data in the Admin GraphQL API

owner_resource.description: The resource type of the owner associated with the metafield data

value_type.description: The data type of the value stored in the metafield

key.description: The key associated with the metafield data

created_at.description: The date and time when the metafield data was created

id.description: The unique identifier for the metafield data

namespace.description: The namespace of the metafield data

description.description: The description of the metafield data

value.description: The value of the metafield data

updated_at.description: The date and time when the metafield data was last updated

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the metafield data belongs

type.description: The type of data stored in the metafield
